title: Drawing, "Poster Design: "LCC Evening Classes" (for the London Underground)", June 18, 1935
signed: Signed in black gouache, lower right: E. McK. K.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right: This head for palette.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: The photograph of a classical head of Venus on a palette with brush. A star, upper left. In the left margin, in blue lettering: L.C.C.; lower section, in white: EVENING CLASSES; lower left, in gray: QUICKEST WAY / [in red:] UNDERGROUND.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Poster Design: "LCC Evening Classes" (for the London Underground)", June 18, 1935.
June 18, 1935. Brush and gouache, photographic collage. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-506.
